<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

---

The guard of this _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [main-gauche](/Weapons.aspx?ID=32)_ is inscribed with eldritch glyphs that guard against magic. When you are benefiting from the +1 circumstance bonus to AC from this weapon's [parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190) trait, you also apply that circumstance bonus to your saving throws against spells that target you.
